To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private GapSideBySideWhite _gapsidebysidewhite;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_gapsidebysidewhite = GapSideBySideWhite(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_gapsidebysidewhite.IsReady)
{
    var period = _gapsidebysidewhite.Period.Value;
    var current = _gapsidebysidewhite.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.gapsidebysidewhite = self.GapSideBySideWhite(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.gapsidebysidewhite.IsReady:
    period = self.gapsidebysidewhite.Period.Value
    current = self.gapsidebysidewhite.Current.Value
